name: Safety First (ChocolateCookieBro)
description:
You are a pilot who was on the job when suddenly a really bad storm hit the area, making piloting the plane much more of a challenge. The worse news about this is that because of the weather a tsunami was formed and is wiping out the population, making you and the passengers the last people in a couple of hours! Dodge as many storm clouds and lightning bolts to stay on air as long as possible.

Controls: arrow keys to move

start screen music - https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/45432/

bg music - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/too-fly/215

game over music - https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/rain/
